about_the_game:
Awesome and upgraded items inside the [NEW] Gold Package!
The [NEW] Gold Pack consists of a full set Black/White Suit that will give you a distinctive look.
This pack also comes with three different kinds of 30-days vouchers, a powerful pet, and gear boosters all in just one package!

Details:
1. Suit Selectable Box(Black/White) X1
• Get dressed to your taste, and beat them up!

2. +14 Gear Booster X1
• 100% chance of enhancing your gear to +14!

3. S Guaranteed D Component : Gear X1

4. S Guaranteed D Component : Costume X1

5. Skill D Component : Gear X1

6. Skill D Component : Costume X1

• Get all our support and be more powerful!

7. Elite Status (30-Day) X1
• Get 30 days of the premium buff!

8. Gardening Voucher (30-Day) X1
• Get 30 days of farm planting support!

9. Maid Service Voucher (30-Day) X1
• Get 30 days of My Room exploration support!

Notes:
• Suit costume is available for all characters except for Aeri.
• DLC contents will be delivered to your in-game delivery box.
• DLC packs can only be received once per account. Once you purchased it, you won't be able to receive the same pack again as a gift.
• All DLC packs will be updated every after a new character release. After the update, new characters may able to use its components.
• Look forward to more packs that will be released on Steam and in-game!

name: [NEW] Closers Gold Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelIntel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelIntel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050Ti or better graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Awesome and upgraded items inside the [NEW] Closers Gold Package
